about_the_game:
Deep Fishing is a free casual shooting game, you will dive into the deep sea with other players, use the turret to catch fish to win gold, and find treasure from the pirate's treasure chest.

Key Features:


OVER 100 SPECIES OF FISH AND DEEP SEA MONSTERS:
  • Bomb fish: it will explode after being caught, and the surrounding fish will be catched
  • Missile fish: after being captured, the player will be able to launch a missile to attack the fish in the fishing ground for 30 seconds
  • Lightning fish: it will discharge after being caught and the surrounding fish will be electrified
  • Archer fish: player will receive 30 seconds free shooting time after being captured
  • Whirlpool fish: a whirlpool will be generated after being caught, and the fish pass through will be captured
  • Ghost ship: after being captured, the player will gain a magic staff, which can be used 3-5 times. Each use will produce a AOE kill effect
  • Stingray: after being captured, players will enter treasure hunting games
  • Bonus fish: you will get points bonus after being captured. You can enter the lottery game when the points reach a certain amount
  • Lightning Dragon: it will produce 1-9 AOE kill effects after being captured
  • Ceberus: after being captured, it will have 5 AOE kill effects
  • Summoned Volcano Knight: after being captured, it will produce a AOE kill effect lasting 30 seconds

AN ARIETY OF TURRETS AND RICH REWARD SYSTEMS:

The game has seven different styles, the rarity in among of ordinary to legendary, with a total number of ten kinds of turrets, and the types of subsequent turrets will continue to be updated. Each turret has different skills and additional attributes. When fishing, switching different turrets can produce totally different game experience.

In addition to the turret skin, in order to obtain greater fishing benefits, you need to use diamonds and various materials to strengthen the turret multiplier. At present, multiplier can be upgraded to 10000X, which can make you gain tens of millions of benefits of one-shot. The higher multiplier the turret has, the more chance to trigger special effects when catching fish.

Catch boss fish or some special fish, and also get the Ultimate Fishing weapon: Plasma Gun which make you get tens of millions of profits.
In addition, there are also jackpot and many other reward systems in the game. Gold coins are flowing into the pocket anytime and anywhere, which is super exciting.

This is NOT a war, it's fishing!
More tag about this game: Causal, Squid Game,Arcade Game,Slots Machine,Casino Simulator,Gambling Game,Mahjong,Video Poker,Cards Game,Texas Holdem,Hold'em,Blackjack,Bullet Hell,Red Dog,All In,Fishing Planet,Fishing Simulator,Ruassian Fishing,Fishing Sim World

Deep Fishing is a free casual shooting game, you will dive into the deep sea with other players, use the turret to catch fish to win gold, and find treasure from the pirate's treasure chest.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64Bits
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 | AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit | Windows 8 64-bit | Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K | AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible

short_description: Deep Fishing is a free casual shooting game, catch fish and sea monsters and hunt treasures in the deep sea to build your empire on the sea.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
